Package com.wrapper.spotify

Class Api

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wrapper.spotify.Api

  • public class Api
extends Object
    Instances of the Api class provide access to the Spotify Web API.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Api.Builder
      Builder class for building a Spotify API instance.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      The default host of Spotify API calls.

      The default port of Spotify API calls.
      static UtilProtos.Url.Scheme DEFAULT_SCHEME
      The default http scheme of Spotify API calls.

      • getAlbum

        public AlbumRequest.Builder getAlbum​(String id)
        Get an album.
        Parameters:
        id - The base62 id of the album you're trying to retrieve.
        Returns:

      • getAlbums

        public AlbumsRequest.Builder getAlbums​(String... ids)
        Get multiple albums.
        Parameters:
        ids - The base62 ids of all albums you're trying to retrieve.
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        ids - A {List<String>} instance with base62 ids of all albums you're trying to retrieve.

        Get the top tracks of an artist in a specific country.
        Parameters:
        artistId - A base62 id of the artist.
        countryCode - The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the specific country.
        Returns:
        A builder that builds a request to retrieve the top tracks of an artist.

      • authorizationCodeGrant

        public AuthorizationCodeGrantRequest.Builder authorizationCodeGrant​(String code)
        Returns a builder that can be used to build requests for authorization code grants. Requires client ID, client secret, and redirect URI to be set.
        Parameters:
        code - An authorization code.
        Returns:
        A builder that builds authorization code grant requests.

      • refreshAccessToken

        public RefreshAccessTokenRequest.Builder refreshAccessToken​()
        Returns a builder that can be used to build requests to refresh an access token that has been retrieved using the authorization code grant flow.
        Returns:
        A builder that builds refresh access token requests.

      • clientCredentialsGrant

        public ClientCredentialsGrantRequest.Builder clientCredentialsGrant​()
        Returns a builder that can be used to build requests for client credential grants. Requires client ID and client secret to be set.
        Returns:
        A builder that builds client credential grant requests.

      • getPlaylist

        public PlaylistRequest.Builder getPlaylist​(String userId,
                                           String playlistId)
        Get a playlist.
        Parameters:
        userId - The playlist's owner's username.
        playlistId - The playlist's ID.
        Returns:
        A builder object that can be used to build a request to retrieve a playlist.

        Get information about the user that has given authorization to the application.

        Get a user's starred tracks.
        Parameters:
        userId - The starred playlist's owner's username.

                                                             String playlistId,
                                                             String[] trackUris)
        Add tracks to a playlist.
        Parameters:
        userId - The owner's username.
        playlistId - The playlist's ID.
        trackUris - URIs of the tracks to add.
        Returns:
        A builder object that can be used to build a request to add tracks to a playlist.

        Parameters:
        userId - The owner's username.
        playlistId - The playlist's ID.
        Returns:

        public GetMySavedTracksRequest.Builder getMySavedTracks​()
        Get a users Your Music tracks.
        Returns:
        A builder object that can be used to build a request to get the user's Your Music library.

      • containsMySavedTracks

        public ContainsMySavedTracksRequest.Builder containsMySavedTracks​(String[] trackIds)
        Check if a track is saved in the user's Your Music library.
        Parameters:
        trackIds - The tracks ids to check for in the user's Your Music library.
        Returns:
        A builder object that can be used to check if a user has saved a track.

      • removeFromMySavedTracks

        public RemoveFromMySavedTracksRequest.Builder removeFromMySavedTracks​(String[] trackIds)
        Remove a track if saved to the user's Your Music library.
        Parameters:
        trackIds - The track ids to remove from the user's Your Music library.
        Returns:
        A builder object that can be used to remove tracks from the user's library.

      • addToMySavedTracks

        public AddToMySavedTracksRequest.Builder addToMySavedTracks​(String[] trackIds)
        Save tracks in the user's Your Music library.
        Parameters:
        trackIds - The track ids to add to the user's library.
        Returns:
        A builder object that can be used to add tracks to the user's library.

      • createAuthorizeURL

        public UtilProtos.Url createAuthorizeURL​(String[] scopes,
                                         String state)
        Retrieve a URL where the user can give the application permissions.
        Parameters:
        scopes - The scopes corresponding to the permissions the application needs
        state - state A parameter that you can use to maintain a value between the request and the callback to redirect_uri.It is useful to prevent CSRF exploits.
        Returns:
        The URL where the user can give application permissions.

      • createAuthorizeURL

        public AuthorizationURLRequest.Builder createAuthorizeURL​(String[] scopes)
        Retrieve a URL where the user can give the application permissions. This method returns a builder instead, so that any optional parameters can be added.
        Parameters:
        scopes - The scopes corresponding to the permissions the application needs.
        Returns:
        A builder that when built creates a URL where the user can give the application permissions.

      • setAccessToken

        public void setAccessToken​(String accessToken)
        Set an access token, which may become invalid after a specific amount of time.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - A valid access token.

      • setRefreshToken

        public void setRefreshToken​(String refreshToken)
        Set a refresh token, to retrieve a new access token, if the saved access token becomes invalid.
        Parameters:
        refreshToken - A valid refresh token.
